mapper.select: SELECT TP.ID, TP.PROFESSOR_MAJOR, TP.RESEARCH_FIELD, TP.RESEARCH_PROFIT, TP.RESEARCH_PERIOD, TP.RESEARCH_DEADLINE, TP.RESEARCH_START_DATE, TP.RESEARCH_SCHEDULE, TP.RESEARCH_REQUIREMENT, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_TYPE, P.MEMBER_ID, P.POST_VIEW, P.CREATED_DATE, P.UPDATED_DATE FROM TBL_THESIS_POST TP JOIN TBL_POST P ON TP.ID = P.ID WHERE TP.ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_THESIS_POST SET PROFESSOR_MAJOR = #{professorMajor}, RESEARCH_FIELD = #{researchField}, RESEARCH_PROFIT = #{researchProfit}, RESEARCH_PERIOD = #{researchPeriod}, RESEARCH_DEADLINE = #{researchDeadline}, RESEARCH_START_DATE = #{researchStartDate}, RESEARCH_SCHEDULE = #{researchSchedule}, RESEARCH_REQUIREMENT = #{researchRequirement} WHERE ID = #{id}
